original_text: And the children of Israel did according to all that the Lord commanded Moses, so did they.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 그대로 행하되 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 행하였더라

sentences.original_text: And the children of Israel did
according to all that the Lord commanded Moses
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 모세에게 명령하신 모든 것에 따라
